summary.p: DirtySock is a cross-platform client network layer currently available on Linux, PC, Sony PlayStation3, Microsoft Xbox 360, and Nintendo Wii platforms. DirtySock is intended primarily for shipping titles. DirtySock supplies peer-peer networking with reliable UDP, client/server protocols including Aries, HTTP, and SSL, and much more. Please see the included documentation for more information.

changes.p: See the included changelog.txt file for details on changes from previous versions.
